attributes.action: prevent the deportation of Annie Josyanne Ngandjeu Monthe on 5th October 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Josyanne is due to be deported against her will from the UK to Cameroon on Friday morning, 5th October, having failed to be granted asylum in the UK.  We wish the Prime Minister to intervene to prevent this deportation.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
